articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Perseverance's Rock Samples Hint That Mars Had Long-Lasting Ancient Water - ScienceAlert
articles.description: NASA's Perseverance Mars rover has now collected two rock samples, with signs that they were in contact with water for a long period of time boosting the case for ancient life on the Red Planet.
articles.content:
NASA's Perseverance Mars rover has now collected two rock samples, with signs that they were in contact with water for a long period of time boosting the case for ancient life on the Red Planet.

articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: Russian Soyuz rocket sends classified military payload to orbit - Space.com
articles.description: Russia's ministry of defense sent a classified payload into orbit on a Soyuz rocket Thursday (Sept. 9), according to state media outlet TASS.
articles.content:
Russia's ministry of defense sent a classified payload into orbit on a Soyuz rocket Thursday (Sept. 9), according to state media outlet TASS.
